sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; function Dashboard({ onLogout }) { const username = localStorage.getItem('username') || 'Student'; return (

Exam Portal

Welcome, {username}

Ready to take your exam?

Click the button below to start your 30-minute exam session.

Exam Details
Duration: 30 minutes
Questions: 10 multiple choice
Auto-submit: When time expires
Instructions
  • Read each question carefully
  • Select only one answer per question
  • Use Next/Previous to navigate
  • Submit before time runs out

Start Your Exam

Once you begin, the timer will start automatically

); } export default Dashboard;
